detectors.description: Variable SuperCoin._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#43) is not in mixedCase

SuperCoin.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#53-61) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 100000000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#57)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#12)
	- SuperCoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#63-65)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#13)
	- SuperCoin.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#67-69)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#14)
	- SuperCoin.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#71-73)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SuperCoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#81-86)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#15)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#16)
	- SuperCoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#75-79)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#32)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SuperCoin.sol#32-34)
